METADATA.TITLE: Homepage | Depo Next - Secure Storage Solutions
METADATA.DESCRIPTION: Depo Next offers modern and flexible storage spaces for you to store your belongings safely and easily. We aim to provide you with the best service through economical and secure storage solutions tailored to your needs.

OPENGRAPH.TITLE: Homepage | Depo Next - Secure Storage Solutions
OPENGRAPH.DESCRIPTION: Store your belongings safely, easily, and economically with Depo Next. Optimize your space with modern storage solutions.

MAP.HEADING: Centrally Located, Easy Access!
MAP.PARAGRAPH_1: Our warehouse is located in the heart of Istanbul, at Gayrettepe Mahallesi, Vefabey Sokak, Say Apartmanı B Blok No:25 İç Kapı No:1, Beşiktaş.
MAP.PARAGRAPH_2: We are very close to important centers of Istanbul such as Zorlu Center, Kanyon AVM, Levent, Şişli, and Mecidiyeköy.
MAP.PARAGRAPH_3: Thanks to our easily accessible location by public transport, you can always access your belongings quickly and effortlessly.
MAP.PARAGRAPH_4: If you are looking for a secure and easily accessible location for your storage rental process, you are in the right place!

STATS.TITLE: We have earned our customers' trust
STATS.DESCRIPTION: We provide secure storage and transportation services to thousands of individuals and businesses across Turkey.

DISTRICTS.TITLE: Istanbul Districts Where Our Warehouses Are Located
DISTRICTS.DESCRIPTION: We offer secure and modern storage services in districts all over Istanbul.

FAQ_SECTION.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Here you can find answers to the most frequently asked questions about the storage process.

QUESTIONS.question: How are my belongings transported?
QUESTIONS.answer: Your belongings are securely packed by our professional team and transported to the storage area with appropriate vehicles.

QUESTIONS.question: How long can the storage period be?
QUESTIONS.answer: The storage period can be determined entirely according to your needs. We offer both short-term and long-term storage options.

QUESTIONS.question: Are the storage areas secure?
QUESTIONS.answer: Yes. All our storage areas are monitored 24/7 with security cameras and equipped with fire alarm systems.

QUESTIONS.question: How are storage fees determined?
QUESTIONS.answer: Pricing is determined by the volume of belongings, storage duration, and transport distance. Special offers are provided for you.

QUESTIONS.question: How can I retrieve my stored belongings?
QUESTIONS.answer: When you notify us at least 24 hours in advance, we deliver your belongings to you as soon as possible.

FOOTER.BRAND_DESCRIPTION: Store your belongings safely with us through secure, clean, and modern storage solutions.

ABOUT_SECTION.TITLE: About DepoNext
ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Dismantling, packing, transporting, and storing items; we are with you with turnkey storage solutions.

TESTIMONIALS.text: Our belongings were picked up on time and professionally placed in storage. Everything was perfect!
TESTIMONIALS.name: Ayşe Yılmaz
TESTIMONIALS.title: Istanbul

TESTIMONIALS.text: I was informed at every stage throughout the storage process. A very reassuring service.
TESTIMONIALS.name: Mehmet Kara
TESTIMONIALS.title: Ankara

TESTIMONIALS.text: They completely eliminated the stress of moving. The team's attention and professionalism were fantastic.
TESTIMONIALS.name: Elif Demir
TESTIMONIALS.title: İzmir

TESTIMONIALS.text: The storage areas were clean and secure. My belongings were stored without any problems.

PERIOD_DATA.title: Expectations are listened to,
PERIOD_DATA.subTitle: and informed about the operation.
PERIOD_DATA.description: Information about the operation is provided according to the details of the items or products to be stored. Details such as how the items or products will be transported and the storage area are discussed.

PERIOD_DATA.title: A suitable offer is given,
PERIOD_DATA.subTitle: for the needs.
PERIOD_DATA.description: An offer is given considering the condition of the items or products to be stored. The offer specifies both the storage fee and the transport fee.

PERIOD_DATA.title: Items are ready for transport and,
PERIOD_DATA.subTitle: storage.
PERIOD_DATA.description: Items are packed as specified and transported to the warehouse. Packaging materials remain on the items during the storage process.

PERIOD_DATA.title: Your belongings are safe in your
PERIOD_DATA.subTitle: private room storage.
PERIOD_DATA.description: Your belongings have been placed in a private area where you can see them, and they are safe. You can be at ease. In the container solution, your belongings are also kept in a private area for you.

PLANS.NAME: Small Scale Storage

PLANS.NAME: Medium Scale Storage

PLANS.NAME: Large Scale Storage

ABOUT_SECTION.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: At Depo Next, we offer our customers secure, easy, and flexible storage solutions.
ABOUT_SECTION.VISION_DESCRIPTION_1: To become a pioneering and innovative service provider in the storage sector by maximizing customer satisfaction.
ABOUT_SECTION.VISION_DESCRIPTION_2: To produce flexible and reliable solutions tailored to our customers' needs.
ABOUT_SECTION.MISSION_DESCRIPTION_1: To provide high-quality storage spaces that ensure the safe keeping of your belongings.
ABOUT_SECTION.MISSION_DESCRIPTION_2: To provide the best standards in technology and customer service, offering support at every step.
ABOUT_SECTION.HISTORY_DESCRIPTION_1: Depo Next was established in 2023 and has quickly become a trusted name in the sector.
ABOUT_SECTION.HISTORY_DESCRIPTION_2: We are a fast-growing storage solution provider with a customer-focused service approach.
